snippet.title: Beacon of Neyda - Official Trailer | Realms Deep 2023
snippet.description: Check out the trailer for Beacon of Neyda, a side-scroller strategy game coming to PC. In a world where a robot revolution failed, the last humans search for a way to survive and escape. Survive waves of enemies while creating and upgrading your base. Build where you want. Defend what you can.
